inputs: CSV files (customers.csv, competitor_data.csv), OpenAI API key
outputs: Streamlit UI, Discovery cycles, Statistical analyses, Reports
dependencies: streamlit, pandas, numpy, scipy, openai, auto_enhanced_report, world_model_builder, agents

key_functions_classes: WorldModel, Discovery, Trajectory, add_discovery(), add_trajectory(), save(), load()
inputs: Discovery data, Trajectory data, Research questions

outputs: Statistical test results, P-values, Effect sizes

key_functions_classes: perform_statistical_analysis(), Pearson correlation, Linear regression, ANOVA, t-tests

inputs: Statistical analyses, Literature results, LLM responses

outputs: Enhanced text reports with statistical evidence

key_functions_classes: Streamlit tabs, Sidebar controls, Progress tracking, Log display
